snippet: Nik Wallenda will try to walk on a wire across Niagara Falls, right above the tumultuous mists, on Friday, drawing news media and tourists from afar.
abstract: News media and tourists are being drawn to Niagara Falls, NY, as Nik Wallenda prepares to walk on a wire across the Niagara Gorge; stunt is first time a person has attempted walking from one side to the other on a wire since 1896.
lead_paragraph: Nik Wallenda will try to walk on a wire across Niagara Falls, right above the tumultuous mists, on Friday, drawing news media and tourists from afar.

headline.seo: Nik Wallenda Is Set to Cross Niagara Falls Friday
headline.main: After Century-Long Wait, Stage Is Set for Man Daring to Cross the Falls
headline.print_headline: Niagara Abuzz, as Tightrope Walk Nears
